summary: First off, I don’t mean anything bad by this
body:
First off, I don’t mean anything bad by this

But as someone who has watched D & P for a while and not really gotten involved in the phandom, I personally do not believe that they are dating each other. If they are, that’s great, but I just don’t see it for some reason. However, I did notice a while back that there was some talk of queerbaiting and I definitely agree that if they are secretely two straight men than it would be weird of them to keep feeding into the theories on their private life. Basically, to make an unnecessarily long post short, what would it mean to you if Dan and Phil made videos tomorrow putting rumours to rest and telling you that they are not dating and never have. Would you stop watching, get mad, frustrated?

I am genuinely just curious, again, I do not mean to question anyone here.

I am genuinely just curious, again, I do not mean to question anyone here.

If they are, that’s great, but I just don’t see it for some reason. However, I did notice a while back that there was some talk of queerbaiting and I definitely agree that if they are secretely two straight men than it would be weird of them to keep feeding into the theories on their private life. summary: I just went past a completely pink house. And I was like "that's where I want to live" and then I looked at the house number,...

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: dan's solo content often gets more views than the phil collabs on his channel. out of the two of them, dan has more of an...
question: dan's solo content often gets more views than the phil collabs on his channel. out of the two of them, dan has more of an audience that is there just for him alone and not for 'phan'. it sucks because i've always considered phil to be naturally funny and pretty creative, but him succumbing to the phandom's wishes for more and more dan makes me sad and it's almost like amazingphil is not even his channel anymore and instead it's "AmazingMonthlyUpdatesOnDanielHowell", which is ridiculous
answer:
Okay I know this was supposed to be serious but I’m giggling at “AmazingMonthlyUpdatesOnDanielHowell.” And imagining a future where Phil posts a short clip on the last day of each month, just pointing the camera at Dan while he does some mundane task, and saying “there he is. Still going.”


But in all seriousness, I do get what you’re saying. Phil deserves more credit than what he gets.

reblog.comment:
Okay I know this was supposed to be serious but I’m giggling at “AmazingMonthlyUpdatesOnDanielHowell.” And imagining a future where Phil posts a short clip on the last day of each month, just pointing the camera at Dan while he does some mundane task, and saying “there he is. Still going.”


But in all seriousness, I do get what you’re saying. Phil deserves more credit than what he gets.
